about.title: Profile
about.p1: Full-stack software developer with a strong frontend focus, building production-ready web applications from scratch.
about.p2: Experienced in autonomous development, product-oriented thinking, and shipping real systems used in production. Background in engineering and industrial consulting, bringing rigor, documentation discipline, and reliability to software projects.

items: Designed and developed a full-stack <highlight>SaaS for automated lead capture</highlight> and processing

Data persistence with <highlight>PostgreSQL</highlight>, structured schemas and validations
Deployed and operated in production (CI/CD, monitoring, iterations)

Gestion de la persistance des données et de la fiabilité applicative en production
